registry.title: Global Switch Management Protocol version 3 (GSMPv3) Traffic Control Name Space
Traffic Control Flags
registry.expert: Stefaan De Cnodder and Avri Doria

record.description: Indicates that the Traffic Control is not available in the Capability Set.
Indicates that the Traffic Control is applied to all connections that use the Capability Set.
Indicates that the Traffic Control is available for application to connections that use the Capability Set on a per connection basis.
